cashBackExplanation.title: How Cashback Works
cashBackExplanation.introduction: One of the standout features of the Citi Double Cash Card is its unique cashback structure. You don't have to worry about quarterly sign-ups, rotating categories, or making specific purchases to earn high rewards. Here's how it breaks down:

features.title: 1% when you buy
features.description: For every pound you spend, you earn 1% cashback immediately.

features.title: 1% when you pay
features.description: The second 1% comes when you make a payment towards your balance.

features.title: No cashback limit
features.description: You can keep earning rewards no matter how much you spend.

cashBackExplanation.conclusion: This system is ideal for those who use their credit card for a wide variety of purchases and want to avoid the complexity of other rewards programmes. The Citi Double Cash Card ensures that every purchase, no matter how small or large, gives you value.

callToAction.title: Ready to take advantage of these benefits?
callToAction.description: Apply for the Citi Double Cash Credit Card today and start earning cashback on every purchase. Our simple application process takes only minutes to complete.
